views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubWarning: 使用 LNDHub 的任何实例，管理员都可以跟踪您的余额、交易、您连接的 IP 地址，甚至可以盗用您的资金。
views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubFriend: 如果您有一个信任的朋友正在运行一个 LND 节点，您可以考虑让其设置一个 LNDHub 实例供你连接。
views.Settings.AddEditNode.certificateWa:
选择不使用证书验证可能会使您容易受到中间人攻击。 
请自行决定是否这样做。
如果您不验证与 VPN 或 Tor v3 隐藏服务配置的连接，我们强烈建议您在此设备上安装节点的证书。
views.Settings.WalletConfiguration.certi: 我明白了，保存钱包配置
views.Settings.AddEditNode.macaroon: 蛋白杏仁饼干（十六进制格式）
views.Settings.AddEditNode.scanLnc: 从闪电终端扫描 LNC 二维码
views.Settings.WalletConfiguration.delet: 嵌入式 LND 钱包必须处于活动状态才能删除。将此钱包设为活跃钱包？
该钱包有开通或待处理的通道。我们建议在继续操作前手动关闭这些通道，否则通道将在恢复时被强制关闭。
该钱包有链上余额。请确保在继续操作前备份您的助记词。
views.Settings.CertInstallInstructions.g: 要在 Android 系统上安装证书，将证书文件复制到你的设备上。然后进入 设置 > 安全 > 从存储空间安装。它应该检测到证书，并让您把它安装到设备上。该证书的扩展名应该是 .crt
要在 iOS 上安装一个证书，请将文件传输到您的设备上。一旦您在设备上选择该文件，您将被提示将其作为一个配置文件来安装。你必须在 通用 > 关于 > 证书信任设置 中启用你的证书。该证书的扩展名应该是 .crt
或者，你可以在XCode中为你的手机提供一个带有证书的配置文件。
您可以随时在 设置 > 通用 > 描述文件 中访问证书，并在需要时将其移除。
如果要通过外部主机名或 Tor 连接到节点，则必须将主机名添加到证书中。lnd 在其配置中提供了一个使用 TLSExtraDomain 选项执行此操作的选项。进行更改后，您必须删除并重新生成证书。

views.Settings.Security.loginBackground: 应用程序从后台返回后需要登录
views.ImportAccount.title: 账号导入
views.ImportAccount.existingAccountNote: 如果要导入现有账户，ZEUS 将从以下指定的区块高度重新进行扫描。请将应用程序保持开通状态长达 10 分钟，以便准确反映余额。
views.ImportAccount.existingAccountNote2: 为获得最佳效果，请将区块高度设置为该外部钱包收到的第一笔交易之前的区块。
views.ImportAccount.note: 注意：只有在导入后发生的事件 (存款或支出) 才会被 LND 检测到。稍后将支持重新扫描以检测过去的事件。
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text1: 导入外部账户目前是一项试验性功能。
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text2: 点击 “我明白”，即表示您同意自行承担风险。
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text3: 如果使用外部账户开通闪电通道，请按照屏幕上的所有指示操作，除了您的 ZEUS 钱包外，请勿在任何地方广播交易。
views.OpenChannel.scidAlias: 试图使用短通道标识符（SCID）别名

views.Wallet.BalancePane.sync.text: 抓紧了！您很快就可以使用 ZEUS 了。
views.Wallet.waitForSync: 在发送或接收付款之前，您的节点必须完全同步。请稍等。
views.Wallet.BalancePane.recovery.title: 恢复模式
views.Wallet.BalancePane.recovery.text: 请保持 ZEUS 处于打开状态，直到该过程完成。
views.Wallet.BalancePane.recovery.textAl: 让 ZEUS 保持打开状态，直到完成。
views.Wallet.BalancePane.backup.title: 备份您的资金
views.Wallet.BalancePane.backup.text: 创建备份以避免丢失您的比特币访问权限。
views.Wallet.MainPane.error: 连接到节点时出错。请检查您的设置，然后重试。
views.Wallet.Wallet.connecting: Zeus 正在连接你的节点。
views.Wallet.Wallet.loadingAccount: ZEUS 正在加载您的账户。
views.Wallet.Wallet.startingNode: ZEUS 正在启动您的节点。
views.Wallet.Wallet.expressGraphSync: ZEUS 正在运行极速图表同步。抓紧了
views.Wallet.KeypadPane.lspExplainerFirs: 建议您的首次闪电接收金额为 100,000 聪以上，越多越好。设置费用将从该金额中扣除。
views.Wallet.KeypadPane.lspExplainer: 如果通过闪电支付，您将被收取设置费。
views.BTCPayConfigQRScanner.text: 请在 “设置” > “服务” > “LND Rest” 下扫描 BTCPay 配置文件
views.BTCPayConfigQRScanner.error: 获取 BTCPay 配置文件时出错
views.Channel.localInboundBaseFee: 本地流入基础手续费用
views.Channel.remoteInboundBaseFee: 远程流入基础手续费用
views.Channel.title: 通道
views.Channel.localReserve.info: 您的节点在通道中必须保留的最小聪数量。用于防止欺诈行为。
views.Channel.remoteReserve.info: 您的对等节点在通道中必须保留的最小聪数量。用于防止欺诈行为。
views.Channel.csvDelay.info1: CSV 延迟（或时间锁延迟）是闪电网络中的一项安全功能，用于防止通道被过早关闭。它是一种内置的延迟机制，通过时间来加强安全性，并为双方提供在资金释放前解决问题的时间。
views.Channel.csvDelay.info2: 如果您是强制关闭的发起人，您将需要等待此时间段后才能在链上访问您的资金。
views.Channel.feePerKw: 每千权重单位交易费用
views.Channel.closingRate: （可选）关闭通道手续费（聪/虚拟字节）
views.Channel.externalAddress.info1: 如果指定了此地址，您的通道资金将发送到该外部地址，而不是内部钱包中的地址。
views.Channel.externalAddress.info2: 在开启此通道时已设置关闭地址。您的资金将仅发送到该地址，并且无法更改。
views.Channel.forceClose.infoText1: 强制关闭应仅在通道对方长时间离线时进行。通常，发起强制关闭的一方需要等待才能花费他们的比特币，而另一方可以立即花费他们的资金。
views.Channel.forceClose.infoText2: 等待期的长度在通道开通时就已确定。它可以从一天到几周不等。此时间段可能会在本页显示，标记为“CSV 延迟”。
views.Channel.peerAliasScid: 对等节点短通道标识符（SCID）别名
views.Channel.zeroConfConfirmedScid: 零确认已确认的短通道标识符（SCID）
views.Channel.lease.lspDiscretion: 该通道可由流动性服务提供方（LSP）自行决定何时关闭
views.Channel.lease.lspDiscretion.explai: 流动性服务提供方（LSP）保留随时关闭您的通道的权利。资金大量被推向 LSP 一方的通道，更有可能被关闭。
如果您希望确保通道保持开通状态，可以考虑购买通道租赁服务。
views.UTXOs.CoinControl.noUTXOs: 没有可用的未花费交易输出（UTXO）
views.UTXOs.label: 标签
views.EditFee.halfHourFee: 在半小时内确认的费用
views.EditFee.hourFee: 在一小时内确认的费用

views.LncQRScanner.error: 解析 LNC 配置时出错

views.NodeInfo.title: 节点信息

views.NodeQRScanner.error: 扫描的二维码不是有效的闪电节点。
views.Intro.quickStartExplainer: 您在手机上的个人节点
views.Intro.creatingWallet: ZEUS 正在创建您的钱包
views.Intro.choosingPeers: ZEUS 正在为您选择对等节点
views.Intro.carousel1.title: 值得信赖的支付服务
views.Intro.carousel1.text: ZEUS 运行一个比特币和闪电网络节点，以验证并保护您的交易隐私。
views.Intro.carousel2.title: 链上转账
views.Intro.carousel2.text: 使用 ZEUS 定期进行链上比特币转账。
views.Intro.carousel3.title: 闪电网络支付
views.Intro.carousel3.text: 使用闪电网络进行（几乎）即时、低费用的比特币支付。
views.Intro.carousel4.title: 管理闪电网络
views.Intro.carousel4.text: 超越基本的比特币钱包，管理您的闪电通道、流动性等等。
views.Intro.errorCreatingWallet: 创建钱包时出错。请重新启动应用程序并重试。
views.OpenChannel.importText: 检测到剪贴板有如下节点的 URI
views.OpenChannel.peerSuccess: 已成功连接到对等节点
views.OpenChannel.closeAddressExplainer: 合作关闭通道时用于接收资金的可选地址。该地址只能在开通通道时设置，并且仅在对等节点支持该功能的情况下生效。如果已设置，该通道只能关闭到该地址。
views.Payment.title: 支付
views.PaymentRequest.title: 闪电发票
views.PaymentRequest.feeEstimateExceedsL: 此支付的预计手续费高于下方设置的上限。请考虑提高手续费上限以避免支付失败。
views.PaymentRequest.mpp.explainer1: 多路径支付是一种将单笔支付拆分为多份小额支付，并通过网络中不同路径进行路由的技术。
views.PaymentRequest.mpp.explainer2: 保持此选项开启以提高支付成功的几率。
views.PaymentRequest.amp.explainer1: 原子多路径支付（AMP）是多路径支付的一种变体，在接收端以原子方式重新组合支付。支付的所有部分要么全部成功，要么全部失败。
views.PaymentRequest.amp.explainer2: 目前该变体仅由闪电网络守护进程（LND）支持。
views.PaymentRequest.maxPartsDescription: 可用于完成整个支付金额的最大部分支付数量。
views.PaymentRequest.lndGettingReady: 闪电网络守护进程（LND）正在准备支付，请稍候。
views.PaymentRequest.lndGettingReadyRece: 闪电网络守护进程 (LND) 正在准备接收支付，请稍候。
views.PaymentRequest.notAllowedToSend: 此钱包不允许发送资金！
views.Receive.title: 收款
views.Receive.warningLndHub: 请注意，LNDHub 有一个固定的链上地址
views.Receive.p2wkhDescription: 一种更现代的地址类型，可为收款和付款节省交易费用。
views.Receive.np2wkhDescription: 仅在服务将您的隔离见证（P2WKH）或主根（P2TR）地址标记为无效时使用。
views.Receive.np2wkhDescriptionAlt: 仅在服务将您的隔离见证（P2WKH）地址标记为无效时使用。
views.Receive.p2trDescription: 最新、最强大的比特币地址类型，但支持度不广。
views.Receive.lspExplainerUnified: 如果通过闪电网络支付，闪电服务提供商（LSP）将收取以下金额作为设置费用：
views.Receive.lspExplainer: 闪电服务提供商（LSP）将收取以下金额作为设置费用：
views.Receive.lspExplainerRoutingUnified: 如果通过闪电网络支付，闪电服务提供商（LSP）将收取以下金额作为手续费用：
views.Receive.lspExplainerRouting: 闪电服务提供商（LSP）将收取以下金额作为手续费用：
views.Receive.goToLspSettings: 前往闪电服务提供商（LSP）设置
views.Receive.lspSwitchExplainer1: 闪电服务提供商（LSP）将为您提供零确认通道，使您能够在闪电网络上发送和接收付款。
views.Receive.lspSwitchExplainer2: 闪电服务提供商（LSP）还会包装您的发票，使您更容易接收付款，同时保护您的隐私。
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer1: 路由提示提供了查找未公布或未广播通道的信息。这使得付款可以路由到网络中未公开可见的节点。
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer2: 如果您仅使用未公布通道，或者有人尝试向您付款却无法通过您已公布的通道到达时，开启路由提示会很有帮助。
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer3: 当您只有未公布通道时，路由提示会自动启用。
views.Receive.ampSwitchExplainer1: 原子多路径支付（AMP）是一种新的闪电支付方式，可以分多次完成付款。
views.Receive.ampSwitchExplainer2: 请注意，原子多路径支付（AMP）发票目前仅与闪电网络守护进程（LND）节点兼容。
views.Receive.lspZeroAmt: 闪电服务提供商（LSP）与零金额不兼容。已生成未包装发票，您的节点公钥将被暴露。
views.Receive.blindedPathsExplainer1: 在发票中使用盲化路径是一种高级隐私技术，它允许您隐藏节点公钥，而节点公钥通常会在大多数闪电发票中被公开。
views.Receive.blindedPathsExplainer2: 请注意，并非所有钱包目前都支持支付带有盲化路径的 BOLT 11 发票，并且支付成功的可能性可能会降低。
views.Send.title: 发送
views.Send.keysendNotSupported: 目前不支持发送 Keysend 支付。
views.Send.noOnchainBalance: 当前无链上余额。请先关闭通道或接收一笔链上交易。
views.Send.noLightningBalance: 当前无闪电网络余额。请先开通通道或接收一笔闪电网络支付。
views.Send.zaplockerWarning: 这是一张 Zaplocker 发票，可将付款保留长达 24 小时。支付后请定期打开 ZEUS，以帮助降低通道被强制关闭的风险。操作请自行承担风险。
views.SendingLightning.lowFeeLimitMessag: 这笔付款可能因手续费上限过低而失败。请尝试提高手续费上限后重试。
views.SendingLightning.inTransit: 支付正在处理中。它可能很快完成，也可能最终失败。请查看“活动”界面以跟踪进度。
views.SendingLightning.isZaplocker: Zaplocker 支付正在处理中。它可能很快完成，否则资金将在 24 小时内返还。请在“活动”查看进度。
views.SendingLightning.paymentTimedOut: 支付超时。它可能仍在处理中，可能很快完成，也可能最终失败。请在“活动”查看进度。
views.NostrContacts.enterNpub: 输入 Nostr 公钥（npub）或 NIP-05
views.NostrContacts.importContactsError: 导入联系人失败，请重试。
views.NostrContacts.nip05Error: 获取 NIP-05 个人资料出错

views.Tools.cashu.bumpWalletCounters.sub: 当钱包计数器不同步并遇到“输出已被签名过”错误时，这将很有帮助。
views.Tools.cashu.deleteData: 删除所有 Cashu 数据
views.Tools.cashu.deleteData.confirmTitl: 您确定要删除所有 Cashu 数据吗？
views.Tools.cashu.deleteData.confirmMess: 资金仍可通过重新添加您的铸币恢复，但交易历史将会丢失。
stores.CashuStore.dataDeletedMessage: 您的 Cashu 数据已被删除。

views.Tools.nodeConfigExportImport.expla: 导出的钱包配置可以在“文件 > 下载”中找到。
导出的钱包配置可在“文件”应用程序里的 ZEUS 文件夹中找到。

views.Settings.SignMessage.title: 签名或验证消息
views.Settings.SignMessage.placeHolder: 《泰晤士报》2009年1月3日 财政大臣正面临第二次银行救助的边缘
views.Settings.SignMessage.success: 成功！这是输入消息的有效签名。
views.Settings.SignMessage.error: 验证失败。请重新检查消息和签名。
views.Settings.SignMessage.pleaseSelectA: 请输入一个比特币地址以进行链上验证
views.Settings.SignMessage.noAddressForV: 未提供用于链上验证的地址
views.Settings.SignMessage.noDataReceive: 签名操作未接收到任何数据

views.Settings.Display.title: 界面
views.Settings.Display.displayNickname: 在主界面上方显示节点昵称
views.Settings.Display.removeDecimalSpac: 移除比特币金额的小数位
views.Settings.Display.showMillisatoshiA: 显示毫聪（千分之一个聪）金额
views.Settings.Privacy.title: 隐私
views.Settings.Payments.title: 付款设置
views.Settings.Payments.feeLimitMethodEx: 手续费限额方式将默认为：当金额 ≤ 1000 个聪时采用固定值，当金额 > 1000 个聪时采用百分比。不过，您仍然可以在“支付请求”视图里的“设置”部分修改所使用的方式和金额。
views.Settings.Invoices.title: 发票设置
views.Settings.Invoices.displayAmountOnI: 在发票上显示请求的金额
views.Settings.Invoices.receiverNameExpl: 在所有发票中添加的收款人名称，用于帮助付款方识别他们正在支付给谁。
views.Settings.Channels.title: 通道设置
views.Settings.Privacy.lurkerMode.explai: 潜水模式 – 将所有敏感数值替换为古希腊字符来隐藏。
这是向他人演示应用程序的绝佳方式，同时不会泄露您的敏感信息。
长按任意隐藏的数值，可在几秒内临时显示实际数据。
views.Settings.Privacy.clipboard.explain: 如果启用，ZEUS 将会读取您复制到剪贴板的内容，并在可用于应用时提示您。
views.Settings.Privacy.enableMempoolRate: 启用 Mempool.space 费率建议

views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.title: Embedded node
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.NeutrinoPeer: 设置您希望从中下载区块头并通过其广播交易的对等节点。
仅连接到指定的对等节点
仅连接到指定的对等节点。启用此选项可能会减慢区块同步速度，但如果您在广播交易时遇到问题，这可能会对您有所帮助。
允许与其他对等节点建立连接。
禁止与其他对等节点建立连接。
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.ZeroConfPeer: 设置您希望接受零确认闪电通道的对等节点（不包括闪电服务供应商）。
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.expressGraph: Download Lightning network's gossip data on startup. This will make pathfinding when trying to make a payment much more reliable. Restart the app to take effect. Also known as Speedloader.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.resetExpress: Reset express graph sync on startup
Force a new download of the express graph sync data on startup.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.bimodalPathf: Use the bimodal probability estimator, instead of the default apriori estimator, when attempting to make payments. Restart the app to take effect.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.waitForGraph: Wait for graph sync before paying
Waiting for the lightning network graph to sync will increase your probability of payment success.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.rescan.subti: Rescan blockchain for your on-chain transactions. Restart the app to take effect. Will be unset upon completion.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.compactDb.su: Whether the databases used within LND should automatically be compacted on startup. This is disabled by default because it increases startup time and requires additional disk space to be available during the compaction that is freed afterwards. In general compaction leads to smaller database files.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.stopLndDelet: Stop LND and delete Neutrino files
Upon restart, blockchain header sync will start from scratch and will take several minutes to complete.
Run your LND node with Tor.
Note that calls to rates and Mempool.space endpoints will still be made on clearnet.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.persistentMo: Continue to run LND in the background even when the app is closed.
Continue to run LND and Tor in the background even when the app is closed.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.resetMission: This will reset the mission control state. Can be helpful if you are having issues finding routes while making payments.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.automaticDis: Automatically create disaster recovery data and send it to the Olympus backup service. Disaster recovery data can help you recover your lightning funds in the event of a catastrophic failure.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.clipboardDis: This will copy your disaster recovery data to your clipboard. Provide the latest version of this string in the wallet recovery process to trigger a force closure of all your channels. The funds will return to your on-chain wallet.
It's best practice to create new disaster recovery data after each new channel you open if you're not using automatic backups.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.exportDisast: Back up recovery data to Olympus
Manually back up recovery data to the Olympus backup service.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateDisa: Manually download recovery data from the Olympus backup service and trigger a recovery.
Note that this will close out all your channels and recover their balances to your on-chain wallet once settled.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateAdva: Initiate advanced disaster recovery from Olympus
Manually download older recovery data from the Olympus backup service and trigger a recovery.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateDisa: Manually restore recovery data from the clipboard.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.AdvancedDisa: Failed to load backups. Please try again later.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.AdvancedResc: Kick off a rescan from a specific block height

views.BumpFee.title: Speed up transaction
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer1: An outpoint is a reference to a particular output of a previous transaction. It consists of two parts:
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer2: 1) Transaction ID (txid): This is a unique identifier for a specific transaction on the Bitcoin blockchain.
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer3: 2) Output Index (vout): This denotes which specific output of the referenced transaction is being spent.
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer4: The two are combined with a : character, for example: a1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d:0
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer5: This is the first output in this transaction, as the output index starts at 0. The second output has vout 1, etc.
views.BumpFee.budget.explainer1: The max amount in sats that can be used as the fees. Setting this value greater than the input's value may result in CPFP - one or more wallet utxos will be used to pay the fees specified by the budget.
views.BumpFee.budget.explainer2: If not set, for new inputs, by default 50% of the input's value will be treated as the budget for fee bumping; for existing inputs, their current budgets will be retained.
views.BumpFee.immediate.explainer: Whether this input will be swept immediately. When enabled, the sweeper will sweep this input without waiting for the next batch.

views.LSPS1.serviceInfoText1: This service allows you to purchase channels in advance from the LSP directly. Channels must confirm on-chain before you can use them.
views.LSPS1.serviceInfoText2: If you don't want to wait for on-chain confirmation, you can use our just-in-time channel service. The JIT service will create a 0-conf channel of the amount you specify plus 100k sats of inbound (receiving capacity).

views.Settings.NodeConfiguration.restore: Restoring a wallet will trigger a force close of all your channels. Consider closing your channels on your original device first, if possible, to save on fees and recover your funds more quickly.
views.Settings.NodeConfiguration.embedde: It is recommended to close all your channels manually before moving to another device. Restoring without closing out channels beforehand will trigger force closes, which will result in higher fees and can take up to two weeks to recover your funds.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.noPaymen: No payments to redeem. Check back later.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.noNeedTo: No redeem step required. Payments are sent directly to your wallet.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.statusEx: This is the number of payments that can be made to you while you're offline.
More payment hashes will be sent to the server automatically when required, so that you can continue to receive payments.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.nostrKey: Warning: changing your Nostr keys will delete your pending payments. Please redeem your pending payments before submitting new keys.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.explaine: To get started with a lightning address you must first have a lightning channel from the ZEUS LSP with inbound liquidity.
The easiest way to do so is to purchase a 0-conf channel. Just generate an invoice and pay yourself from another lightning wallet.
Purchasing a standard channel will require you to wait for several on-chain confirmation before your channel is useable.
Including route hints will help the LSP forward your payment to you using your unannounced channels.
This has a privacy tradeoff in that it will expose your unannounced channels to the LSP.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.deleteAd: Are you sure you want to delete your ZEUS Pay Lightning address? This action cannot be undone.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.expl: This lightning address is hosted and powered by our LSP, OLYMPUS by ZEUS. It allows you to accept payments even when you're offline.

It uses payment hashes generated on your device, and hodl invoices, which means the LSP can only temporarily hold the funds and forward them along to you, or return them to the sender (after a 24 hour expiry period), effectively making it self-custodial.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.pres: Press to redeem payment from ZEUS PAY.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.notL: Press to lookup attestations on Nostr.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.vali: Attestation is valid. Press to see details.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.inva: Invalid or conflicting attestations. Press to see details.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.noAt: No Nostr attestations found. Sender's wallet likely doesn't support it yet.
views.Settings.Attestations.title: Attestations
views.Settings.Attestation.title: Attestation
views.Settings.CurrencyConverter.title: Currency Converter
views.Settings.CurrencyConverter.error: Error fetching rates. Tap to try again.
views.LspExplanation.title: What are these fees?
views.Settings.CustodialWalletWarning.gr: The wallet you are using is custodial. This means that the funds here are not fully in your control, and can be stolen by the operator of the service.
This wallet is more akin to a bank account than a bitcoin wallet. You don't have access to the bitcoin keys, but rather credentials that can be revoked at any moment.
ZEUS has the ability to create a self-custodial wallet in the app. This wallet provides you with a 24-word seed phrase that gives you full control of your funds.
To get started with your own self-custodial wallet, press the button below, and hit the 'Create mainnet wallet' button on the next screen.
views.Settings.CustodialWalletWarning.di: Please confirm the following to dismiss the warning:
I know that I don't have custody of the funds in this wallet without the 12 or 24 word seed phrase
I know that an LNDHub account password is not the same as a seed phrase
I either set up this connection myself or I trust the person who set it up
I'm not just lying to get this over with
view.Settings.LSPServicesList.title: LSP Services
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.Chantools.Sw: The number of keys to scan per derivation path.
Use this to add a pause between queries if you get rate limited by the API.
views.Settings.Ecash.title: Ecash settings
views.Settings.Ecash.enableEcash.subtitl: Cashu is a Chaumian ecash protocol built for Bitcoin. It's a custodial solution but with better privacy than a traditional account.

You'll only want to store in Cashu what you can afford to lose, but it can make for a great solution for those who just want to test ZEUS for the first time or don't have enough bitcoin to open a Lightning channel yet.
ZEUS will periodically prompt you to upgrade to self-custody, once you have enough bitcoin to purchase a Lightning channel.
views.Settings.Ecash.sweepThresholdSatsT: Funds will be automatically swept to your self-custodial wallet if the balance you have with a mint exceeds this threshold.
views.LspExplanation.text1: Zeus is a self-custodial lightning wallet. In order to send or receive a lightning payment, you must open a lightning payment channel, which has a setup fee.
views.LspExplanation.text2: Once the channel is set up, you'll only have to pay normal network fees until your channel exhausts its capacity.
views.LspExplanation.buttonText2: Learn more about how the LSP works
views.LspExplanationRouting.text1: In order to provide you with some privacy and improve payment performance, the Lightning Service Provider (LSP) will do some heavy lifting for you with a technique called invoice wrapping. The fee is nominal; it's typically just a few satoshis.
views.LspExplanationRouting.text2: You can turn off the LSP entirely and save on these fees by navigating to Settings > Lightning Service Provider (LSP), but you will sacrifice these privacy and payment performance gains.
views.LspExplanationWrappedInvoices.text: Wrapped invoices are invoices with extra layers around them. In this instance, the LSP will wrap an invoice generated from your node. The wrapped invoice will appear as if it is generated by the LSP.

This has two benefits: 1) The end user doesn't have to expose their node's public key to senders. The LSP knows the receiver but no one else does. 2) Senders can use routes to the LSP to make a payment instead of having to find a direct path to the end user.

Wrapped invoices uses the same preimage hash as the original invoice. This means that the LSP can't settle the payment without the final receiver completing the payment, so the LSP can't run away with the user's funds.
Be sure to keep Zeus open when receiving payment as the LSP cannot settle payments on your behalf when you're offline.
views.LspExplanationOverview.title: How does the LSP work?
views.LspExplanationOverview.text1: The LSP uses wrapped invoices and 0-conf channels to instantly connect users to the Lightning network.
views.LspExplanationOverview.text2: All you have to do is have the sender pay the invoice Zeus shows you, but here's what happens under the hood:
views.LspExplanationOverview.step1: The receiver generates an invoices on their lightning node and then sends it to the LSP
views.LspExplanationOverview.step2: The LSP creates a wrapped invoice and returns it to the receiver
views.LspExplanationOverview.step3: The receiver gives the wrapped invoices to sender for them to pay
views.LspExplanationOverview.step4: The sender pays the invoice, which goes through the LSP
views.LspExplanationOverview.step5: The LSP detects the payment and opens up a 0-conf, just in time, channel to the receiver
views.LspExplanationOverview.step6: The LSP then forwards the payment to the receiver using that new channel and the payment is completed
views.Sweep.title: Sweep on-chain wallet
views.Sweep.explainer: Sweeping the on-chain wallet will send both the confirmed and unconfirmed balance to the destination address specified above.
views.PSBT.channelWarning: DO NOT PUBLISH the finished transaction by yourself or with another tool. LND MUST publish it in the proper funding flow order OR THE FUNDS CAN BE LOST! Ensure you publish in ZEUS and only when the channel ID above is displayed.
views.PSBT.channelsWarning: DO NOT PUBLISH the finished transaction by yourself or with another tool. LND MUST publish it in the proper funding flow order OR THE FUNDS CAN BE LOST! Ensure you publish in ZEUS and only when the channel IDs above are displayed.
views.TxHex.channelWarning: No channel loaded in the channel funding flow engine. DO NOT PUBLISH if this transaction is for a channel open.

components.NewChannelModal.jit.info2: Starts with receiving capacity so it's great for sending and receiving.
components.NewChannelModal.lsps1.info1: Purchase a channel lease from the LSP.
components.NewChannelModal.lsps1.info2: You'll have to wait for several on-chain confirmations, but it's a bit less expensive than just-in-time channels. Starts with receiving capacity so it's great for sending and receiving.

views.PendingHTLCs.recommendationAndroid: It's recommended to enable Persistent LND or leave ZEUS running while there are pending HTLCs to prevent force closes.

views.Cashu.LightningAddressInfo.explain: This is a custodial Lightning address tied to your Cashu wallet.

It leverages NUT-20 to lock all incoming payments to your Cashu wallet's pubkey. There is no time period in which you must redeem the funds; they are available for you to pull into your Cashu wallet indefinitely.
views.Cashu.UnspentTokens.title: Unspent tokens
views.LightningAddress.NWC.explainer1: This is a self-custodial Lightning address that connects to a remote node using Nostr Wallet Connect (NWC).
views.LightningAddress.NWC.explainer2: Invoices are created directly on your node. There is no need to redeem the funds; they are available on your remote node immediately.

stores.CashuStore.claimError.inconsisten: Token is locked to multiple different wallets

cashu.upgradePrompt.title: Upgrade to Self-Custody?
cashu.upgradePrompt.messageGeneral: Your ecash balance is growing! Consider upgrading to a self-custodial Lightning wallet for better security and control over your funds.
cashu.upgradePrompt.message10k: You now have enough sats to purchase your first Lightning channel! Upgrade to self-custody to truly own your bitcoin.
cashu.upgradePrompt.message25k: Your ecash balance is growing! To ensure you can't lose your funds, consider upgrading to a self-custodial Lightning wallet.
cashu.upgradePrompt.message50k: With this balance, it's strongly recommended to move to a self-custodial Lightning wallet. Don't trust, verify!
cashu.upgradePrompt.message100k: High balance detected! It's crucial to upgrade to a self-custodial Lightning wallet now to secure your funds.
zeuspay.intro.explainer1: ZEUS Pay is a service that give you a Lightning address, like satoshi@zeuspay.com, for receiving payments to your Lightning wallet.
zeuspay.intro.explainer2: Below are the kinds of Lightning addresses you can have for your wallet type:
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.redeemInApp: Payments must be redeemed in the ZEUS app
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.settledUponPay: Payments settle on Lightning at time of payment
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.settledUponRed: Payments settle on Lightning when redeemed in the ZEUS app
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.24hrs: Payments must be redeemed within 24 hours or the payment is returned to the sender
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.channelRequire: Requires a channel with the ZEUS LSP, with inbound liquidity
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.automaticallyA: Payments automatically accepted. No need to redeem manually in the ZEUS app.
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.noLspChannelNe: No need for a channel with the ZEUS LSP
zeuspay.intro.prosAndCons.remotePlusNwc: Requires a remote node with Nostr Wallet Connect
zeuspay.intro.ecash.overview: Just starting your Lightning journey? The Cashu ecash powered address is a great way to get started. Works well on Nostr.
zeuspay.intro.zaplocker.overview: The first-of-its-kind self-custodial Lightning address for mobile wallets.
zeuspay.intro.nwc.overview: Connect directly to your remote node using Nostr Wallet Connect.
views.Swaps.title: Swaps
views.Swaps.infoText: It is recommended you only attempt an uncooperative refund if the service provider is not operational.
views.Swaps.SwapsPane.noSwaps: No swaps have been made yet
views.Swaps.rescueKey.modal.text1: Swap rescue key is a mnemonic of 12 words that will allow you to recover your swaps in case you lose access to your device.
views.Swaps.rescueKey.modal.text2: Save it in a permanent and secure location.
views.Swaps.rescueKey.modal.text3: To continue, please select if you want to generate a new rescue key or import an existing one.
views.Swaps.rescueKey.text1: The following 12 words are your swap refund rescue key. If you lose access to your swap, you can use this key to recover your funds.
views.Swaps.rescueKey.text2: Please write it down and keep it in a safe place. If you lose this key, you will not be able to recover your funds.
views.Swaps.rescueKey.dangerousText: Do you want to copy your 12 word seed to your clipboard?
views.Swaps.rescueKey.android: Keys can be found in Files > Downloads.
views.Swaps.rescueKey.ios: Keys can be found in the Files app under the ZEUS folder
views.Swaps.rescueKey.noSwapsFound: No swaps found for this rescue key
views.Swaps.rescueKey.incorrectHost: Could not connect to the specified host. Please check the host and try again
views.Swaps.rescueKey.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the rescue key? All swaps will also be deleted from your swap history. Please back up your keys before proceeding, as you can use them later to recover those swaps.
views.SwapDetails.title: Swap Details
views.SwapDetails.timeoutBlockHeight.exp: In the event that the service is down and you need to do an uncooperative refund, funds will not be available to you until this block.
views.SwapDetails.waitingForConf: Transaction is in mempool, waiting for confirmation...
views.SwapDetails.waitingForInvoicePayme: Waiting for invoice to be paid...
androidNotification.lndRunningBackground: LND is running in the background
